title: fix(kpi): fix churn calculation and optimize Tinybird queries
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Sharpening the hive metrics
gist.blurb: Optimized our internal KPI dashboard queries for 10x speed and fixed some churn calculations. Data is flowing smoother than honey now.
gist.summary: Fixed churn rate calculations and optimized Tinybird queries for the internal KPI dashboard, resulting in significantly faster data retrieval.
gist.impact: Internal metrics are now more accurate and load much faster, helping the team track platform health better.
gist.visual_concept: A bee analyst working on a retro dashboard/computer screen showing charts. Represents internal metrics and optimization.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a smart bee analyst adjusting a large retro dashboard with glowing green charts. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text on screen: 'KPI'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
